attributes.action: Create a viable alternate to private transport instead of trying to price it out of the public reach
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all good intentions the government is trying to reduce British reliance on  private transport, however they seem to want to do this by pricing it out of the average persons reach rather than offering a suitable alternative, public transport as it stands is not flexible enough to meet the majority of people's transport requirements.
